channel.title: Can't Eat :\
channel.description:
Hey How do I make it so food works? Im using edgville pk as source. ty
EDIT: Ok guys this is wierd, I can only eat to a certian amount of hp. Like you know how hp regens, well i start at 10. That was my max. Now as it slowly goes up i can eat to high hp, Do you understand?

@yeoldhag wrote:

That made me just do animation, no heals or deletion of shark

item.title: Can't Eat :\
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

hmmmm try using mine

case 385: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.setAnimation(0x33D); //c.playSound(317, 000, 020); c.sM("You eat the shark."); if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){ c.sM("It heals some health."); } c.deleteItem(385, slot, 1); c.currentHealth += 20; if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]) c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]; c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016); break;

then spaswn 385 and eat it and see if it work

Read full topic

item.title: Can't Eat :\
item.dc:creator: @yeoldhag yeoldhag
item.description:
@yeoldhag wrote:

I looked in potions.java everything looks fine :\

Should I post some of the eating code?

EDITS:
case 385:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
if(c.eatemote==0){c.setAnimation(0x33D);}
//c.playSound(317, 000, 020);
c.sM(“You eat the shark.”);
if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){
c.sM(“It heals some health.”);
}
if(c.currentHealth <= 0) {
break;
}
c.deleteItem(385, slot, 1);
c.currentHealth += 20;
if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints])
c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints];
c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + “”, 4016);
break;

^^thats is some of the code, eating animations works fine btw

Read full topic
